Package view

Class Validator

java.lang.Object
view.Validator
public final class Validator
extends java.lang.Object
Used to facilitate the verification and validation of inputs from the user in order to guarantee that all the information obtained satisfies certain conditions.

      Similar to isDate(String) but with the option to specify the minimal date the input can be.
      Parameters:
      str - The input to verify
      minDate - The minimal date that the input can be
      Returns:

      length - The maximum length the input can have
      Returns:

      size - The maximum size the number can have (including decimals)
      decimals - The maximum number of decimals de number can hava
      Returns:
